dataset_fields.label: Title
dataset_fields.description:
Give a short and descriptive name for the dataset.

The URL is created automatically based on the dataset title. If necessary, you can edit the URL.

dataset_fields.form_placeholder: Write a description for the dataset.
dataset_fields.label: Description
dataset_fields.description: Describe the datasetâ€™s contents, collection process, quality of the data and possible limits, flaws and applications in an easily understandable way.

dataset_fields.label: Keywords
dataset_fields.description: Select at least one keyword relating to your data that helps users to find your data.

dataset_fields.label: Dataset visibility
dataset_fields.description: You can set the visibility to private temporarily, for example if the dataset is missing some information. Private datasets are visible to all members of the organisation.

dataset_fields.label: High value dataset
dataset_fields.description: You can mark dataset as high value dataset

dataset_fields.label: Access rights
dataset_fields.description:
Select access rights for your dataset:

Non-public datasets may include resources that contain sensitive or personal information.

Restricted datasets may include resources that require payment, resources shared under non-disclosure agreements, resources for which the publisher or owner has not yet decided if they can be publicly released.

dataset_fields.label: More about access rights
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: Write a rights statement for the resource

dataset_fields.label: Links to additional information
dataset_fields.description: Add links to one or more websites with additional information about the data.

dataset_fields.label: Update frequency
dataset_fields.description: Describe how often your data is updated

dataset_fields.label: Dataset maintainer
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: e.g. Digital and Population Data Services Agency
dataset_fields.description: Use your organisation's general email address instead of an employee's contact information to ensure that the email address works even if there are personnel changes. For example, opendata@organisation.fi or kirjaamo@organisation.fi. We can use this email address to contact the dataset maintainer.

resource_fields.label: Name
resource_fields.form_placeholder: e.g. Most popular Finnish first names 2019
resource_fields.description: Give a short and descriptive name for the distribution. If the data covers a specific time frame, mention that in the name.

resource_fields.label: Resource URL
resource_fields.group_description: Add the distribution by adding a link to the data.

resource_fields.label: Format
resource_fields.description: Select a file format for the distribution

resource_fields.label: Size
resource_fields.description:
Enter the file size in bytes.

The size can be approximated as a decimal if the precise size is not known. If data is offered via an API, enter the overall size of the underlying data.

resource_fields.label: Description
resource_fields.form_placeholder: Write a description for the resource
resource_fields.description: Describe the data clearly and concisely. Use as confining terms as possible to make it easier to find and understand the data.

resource_fields.label: Conditions for re-use
resource_fields.description: Describe terms and conditions for re-use. Include how to apply for use permit and information about possible payments and their principles.
resource_fields.form_placeholder: Write a rights statement for the resource

resource_fields.label: Distribution visibility
resource_fields.description: You can set the visibility to private temporarily, for example if the resource is missing some information. Private resources are visible to all members of the organisation.

resource_fields.label: Data status
resource_fields.description: Select if the data you added is a draft version, current version or an archived version. Note that the data can still be downloaded and used even if it is in draft or archived state. This is recommended especially if your dataset has data resources from multiple years.

resource_fields.label: Coordinate system
resource_fields.description: If your data includes geographic information, specify the coordinate system it uses.

resource_fields.label: Temporal granularity
resource_fields.description: Select the time frame by which the data is separated. For example, does the resource include data from every week or month.

resource_fields.label: Geographical accuracy
resource_fields.description: If your data includes geographic information, specify the accuracy in meters
